nodes.text: Nutritive milk was a type of milk that the Partisans kept in a container in their ships bulkhead.
When he was raising Jyn Erso on Wrea, Saw Gerrera preferred to feed them nutritive milk over solid food items because he didn’t like the "hassle" of food.

Imperial lieutenant Thane Kyrell was dispatched to find a Rebel base on Dantooine before the Battle of Yavin. While at that base, the Imperials "commandeered" food from a nearby village, including nutritive milk. Imperial lieutenant commander Ciena Ree drank nutritive milk while serving aboard the Executor.
